varieties.name: Espresso
varieties.description: A concentrated coffee beverage brewed by forcing hot water under high pressure through finely ground coffee.

varieties.name: Cappuccino
varieties.description: A coffee-based drink made with espresso, hot milk, and steamed milk foam.

varieties.name: Latte
varieties.description: A coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk.

varieties.name: Americano
varieties.description: A diluted espresso drink made by adding hot water to espresso shots.

varieties.name: Macchiato
varieties.description: An espresso coffee drink with a small amount of foamed milk.

varieties.name: Mocha
varieties.description: A coffee drink made with espresso, hot chocolate, and steamed milk.

varieties.name: Flat White
varieties.description: An espresso-based coffee drink with velvety steamed milk and a thin layer of microfoam.

varieties.name: Affogato
varieties.description: A dessert coffee made by pouring a shot of hot espresso over a scoop of ice cream or gelato.

varieties.name: Turkish Coffee
varieties.description: A method of brewing coffee where very finely ground coffee is simmered in a pot and served unfiltered.

varieties.name: Irish Coffee
varieties.description: A cocktail consisting of hot coffee, Irish whiskey, sugar, and topped with whipped cream.

varieties.name: Frappuccino
varieties.description: A blended coffee beverage made with ice, coffee, milk, and flavored syrups.

varieties.name: Lungo
varieties.description: A long-pulled shot of espresso, brewed with more water for a milder taste.

varieties.name: Ristretto
varieties.description: A short-pulled shot of espresso, brewed with less water for a stronger taste.

varieties.name: Vienna Coffee
varieties.description: A coffee drink made with black coffee, whipped cream, and chocolate shavings.

varieties.name: Cortado
varieties.description: A coffee drink made with espresso and a small amount of warm milk.

varieties.name: Long Black
varieties.description: A coffee beverage made by pouring a double shot of espresso over hot water.

varieties.name: Piccolo Latte
varieties.description: A smaller version of a latte, typically served in a small glass.

varieties.name: Pour Over
varieties.description: A manual brewing method where hot water is poured over coffee grounds in a filter.

varieties.name: French Press
varieties.description: A coffee brewing device that uses a plunger to press the coffee grounds to the bottom after steeping.

varieties.name: Aeropress
varieties.description: A coffee brewing device that uses air pressure to extract flavors quickly.

varieties.name: Chemex
varieties.description: A pour-over coffee maker known for its hourglass shape and thick filter.

varieties.name: Ethiopian Yirgacheffe
varieties.description: A coffee variety known for its fruity and floral flavors, grown in Ethiopia.

varieties.name: Colombian Supremo
varieties.description: A high-quality coffee from Colombia, known for its smooth and balanced flavors.

varieties.name: Brazilian Santos
varieties.description: A coffee variety from Brazil, typically mild and nutty in flavor.

varieties.name: Jamaican Blue Mountain
varieties.description: One of the most sought-after coffees, grown in the Blue Mountains of Jamaica, known for its mild flavor and lack of bitterness.

varieties.name: Costa Rican Tarrazu
varieties.description: A high-quality coffee from the Tarrazu region of Costa Rica, known for its bright acidity and full body.

varieties.name: Guatemalan Antigua
varieties.description: A coffee variety from the Antigua region of Guatemala, known for its complex flavors and floral aroma.

varieties.name: Mexican Chiapas
varieties.description: A coffee variety from the Chiapas region of Mexico, known for its smooth and chocolatey flavors.

varieties.name: Tanzanian Peaberry
varieties.description: A coffee variety from Tanzania, where only one seed develops inside the coffee cherry, resulting in a smaller, rounder, and more flavorful bean.

varieties.name: Vietnamese Iced Coffee
varieties.description: A strong and sweet coffee drink typically made with dark roasted coffee and sweetened condensed milk.

varieties.name: Turkish Coffee
varieties.description: A method of brewing coffee where very finely ground coffee is simmered in a pot and served unfiltered.
